function ERI_EP04_11()
    --.承-2【11月第3週】「本心」
    SaveData.Title = "本心"

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM08.wav")

    MSG([[ After returning home from Marika-neesan’s hospital room, I was ordered by Akira to sleep beside her. ]])

    --//CG：アキラとの添い寝（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV048aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0662.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “A-Are we really going to sleep...? This is embarrassing, so can you please spare me...?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0616.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “No, you’re not allowed.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0617.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “Right now, Minachin might end up going back to Mariccho’s hospital room again if left alone. So, as a form of supervision, I want you to sleep next to me.” ]])

    MSG([[ It was sad that I couldn’t argue. Actually, going to the hospital room earlier was a semi-unconscious act. ]])

    MSG([[ Given today’s me, it’s no wonder they call me the Siscon Great Demon King. ]])

    --//CG：アキラとの添い寝（ニヤリ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV048ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0618.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “Do you understand? Siscon Supreme Demon King.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0663.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “...Yes.” ]])

    MSG([[ Bewildered that I had been upgraded from Great Demon King to Supreme Demon King, I replied weakly. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0619.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “Besides, it’s not like it’s the first time we’re sleeping together, right? So what’s there to be embarrassed about now?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0664.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “W-Well, that’s true, but...” ]])

    MSG([[ Huh? I really wonder why I’m so conscious about this? I should’ve gotten somewhat used to sleeping beside Akira by now... Strange. ]])

    MSG([[ Today, for some reason, my heart is pounding unusually hard. Maybe it’s because I’m mentally shaken by what happened with Daria-san. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0620.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “You’ve gotten a lot better, but Minachin is still stuck on the ‘Sister is supreme’ ideology.” ]])

    --//CG：アキラとの添い寝（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV048aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0621.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “Until you awaken to my love as your cousin, I’m prepared to keep sleeping beside you as many times as needed.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0665.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “I think I’ve already awakened enough, though.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0622.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “No way! Not nearly enough! You have to depend on me so much that when you leave by my side, you’d babble things like ‘itchy uma’ in broken words like a lost soul.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0666.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Th-That sounds worse than being a siscon! Are you okay?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0623.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “Being an ‘ito-con’ is better than a siscon. Legally in Japan, you can marry the target of an ito-con, after all.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0667.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Ito-con? That’s short for cousin complex? I’ve never heard such a weird pun like shirataki noodles before...” ]])

    MSG([[ It felt like I had just been down in the dumps earlier. Talking with Akira naturally lifted my spirits, and before I knew it, we were back to our usual teasing. ]])

    MSG([[ Surely, this was all thanks to Akira caring about me. ]])

    MSG([[ Today, facing a painful truth I couldn’t bear alone made me realize just how much she supports me. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0668.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “...Thank you so much today, Akira.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0669.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “I think I might understand a little of how Marika-neesan felt, enduring everything alone without telling anyone.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0670.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “When you’re really suffering, your desire to lean on someone and not wanting to be a burden... both feelings just get all mixed up inside your chest.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0671.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “When I think that if you hadn’t been here, I might never have recovered... it sends chills down my spine.” ]])

    MSG([[ For me, Akira truly understands my genuine self, but did Marika-neesan have anyone like that? No, surely she didn’t. ]])

    MSG([[ Marika-neesan hadn’t even shown weakness to me, her own family. She must have continued to act as the perfect beautiful girl even at Yuriai Private Academy. ]])

    MSG([[ Even if she had to face off one-on-one against the national idol Hermes-san, her stance wouldn’t have wavered. ]])

    MSG([[ That’s precisely why she... ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0624.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “Mina, chin...” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0672.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Akira...?” ]])

    --//CG：アキラとの添い寝（ぐっすり）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV048ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ Glancing at Akira, I saw she was breathing softly in sleep. It seemed she had fallen asleep while I was lost in thought alone. ]])

    MSG([[ I heard she pushed herself hard to find me, so even if she didn’t show it, she must’ve been exhausted. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0673.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Good night, Akira. Tomorrow, I’ll make lots of your favorite dishes.” ]])

    MSG([[ I gently touched Akira’s cheek as she slept and whispered so as not to wake her. Then, Akira’s small hand touched mine. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0625.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “Minachin... I love you.” ]])

    MSG([[ Her confession-like sleep-talk made my heart skip. Surely even in her dreams, she was teasing me like usual. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0674.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 (Even though Akira's my cousin, she makes my heart race. I have to pull myself together as a man.) ]])

    MSG([[ I should be used to this kind of mischief, but today my face feels unusually hot. ]])

    MSG([[ I still have a long way to go. Calm down. Calm down. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0626.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “I want... you to stay by my side forever.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0675.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “I love you too, Akira. I’ll be by your side forever, always.” ]])

    MSG([[ Still holding Akira’s hand, I closed my eyes. ]])

    MSG([[ Hoping that even in my dreams, I could be together with this cute cousin. ]])
    --　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERI_EP04_12")
end
